group.name: itsp-account
group.label: ITSP Account
group.description: The information that is specific to a given ITSP account.

setting.name: itsp-proxy-domain
setting.label: ITSP server domain name
setting.description: The domain name of the ITSP. This domain name is used to look up via DNS SRV the address of the SIP server the ITSP uses. If the ITSP does not provide this lookup mechanism specify a server address below. Please contact ATT for the server address.

setting.name: user-name
setting.label: User name
setting.description: The authentication user name attached to the account. This will typically be your inbound phone number.

setting.name: password
setting.label: Password
setting.description: The password for the account. ATT Does not require a password.

setting.name: register-on-initialization
setting.label: Register on initialization
setting.description: Defines whether or not to register with the given ITSP on initialization. ATT Does not use registration.

setting.name: use-global-addressing
setting.label: Use public address for call setup
setting.description: If checked, use the sipXbridge public address for SIP signaling and media (SDP). Otherwise, the local (LAN) address will be used. Using the local address assumes that the ITSP provides NAT traversal functionality.

setting.name: strip-private-headers
setting.label: Strip private headers
setting.description: When sipxbridge sees "strip-private-headers", it will strip sensitive headers such as Subject, Call-Info, Organization, User-Agent, Reply-To and In-Reply-To. Display Name will be stripped where ever it appears.

setting.name: default-asserted-identity
setting.label: Use default asserted identity
setting.description: If checked (default), use the default asserted identity. Otherwise, you must enter a username@domain to override the default. ATT Uses the default for this value.

setting.name: asserted-identity
setting.label: Asserted identity
setting.description: Override the default asserted identity. Not required.

setting.name: is-user-phone
setting.label: User part of INVITE SIP URI is a phone number
setting.description: If true (the default), sipxbridge will attach a user=phone parameter to the call setup INVITE request URI.

setting.name: loose-route-invite
setting.label: ITSP supports "Loose Routing"
setting.description: Defines whether or not to attach a "loose routing (lr)" Route header to the call setup INVITE request.

setting.name: sip-session-timer-interval-seconds
setting.label: Session Timer Interval
setting.description: Session Timer Interval (seconds). Time interval between in-dialog INVITE requests to keep the session alive.

setting.name: sip-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for SIP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the mechanism to use for SIP keepalive. If nothing is specified, CR-LF (empty SIP message) is used.

setting.name: rtp-keepalive-method
setting.label: Method to use for RTP keepalive.
setting.description: Defines the mechanism to use for media (RTP) keepalive.
